CustomField.formula:
CASE(CVC__c,
'Open Credit', (PAX_Travelling__c * OpenCreditNoRefund__c), 'Forced Credit', ( CVC_Credit_Amount__c - Forced_Credit_Amount__c), 'POM',( IF(OR(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1512"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3070"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3065"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3078"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1884"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1893"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3304")), 299, IF(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"1735"), 399, IF(OR(CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3368"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3108"),CONTAINS( Deal_ID_Title__c,"3133")),199,499))) * PAX_Travelling__c ),
0)
CustomField.label: COVID Haircut
